para.text: In order to lawfully sell a stun gun in the District, a vendor shall obtain pursuant to D.C. Official Code ยง 47-2851.03(e) a stun gun endorsement on its basic business license from the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs ("Department") on a form to be provided by the Department.
This section shall not apply to a vendor who sells fewer than 5 stun guns in a 12- month period.
